ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] OT:Wrapping it up...
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the listserve automatically changes everything to pure text. ... From: Gary Johnston  To:  Sent: Friday,
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the listserve automatically changes everything to pure text.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Gary Johnston" <garyj@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 10:32 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT:Wrapping it up...


> Nothing wrong with em :)
> I'd imagine that some people are posting/receiving pure text which loses
the
> rich edit that you post with.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
> Sent: 07 April 2000 15:39
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Wrapping it up...
>
>
> Out of curiosity, do my messages wrap oddly for the rest of you? They
> sure look strange when they get back to me. What do I need to set to
> fix this? It looks stupid.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 47 songs, Innoruuk
>
> (sorry, I only do Mainframes...)
>
>
